Class ElementOp<T extends Element<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.util.ElementOp<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the leaf type of Element.

    public abstract class ElementOp<T extends Element<?>>
extends Object
    Defines a method that applies an operation to an element.
